message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 to us, reflecting its unique features and benefits. Considering its superior attributes, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or needs. For you, I am proposing an exclusive offer of $10000. I am confident this price will not only provide you with a great value but also ensure you experience the unparalleled benefits of our product. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this opportunity.
